scripts.test: babel test/wrapperSpec.js -o test/test.js && mocha test/test.js && rm -rf test/test.js
scripts.test-cov: babel test/wrapperSpec.js -o test/test.js && mv test/wrapperSpec.js test/wrapperSpec.es && node_modules/jscover/bin/jscover src test-cov && node_modules/jscover/bin/jscover test test-cov && mocha test-cov --reporter=mocha-lcov-reporter > test-cov/coverage.lcov && rm -rf test/test.js && mv test/wrapperSpec.es test/wrapperSpec.js
